title: Phase 1: Scaffolding — JourneyLayout, Chapter component, placeholder page
description: Create feat/travel-ithaca branch. Build JourneyLayout.astro extending BaseLayout. Create Chapter.astro (full-viewport wrapper). Create ithaca.astro page with 3 placeholder chapters. Add /travel/ nav link to Header.astro. Create travel/index.astro placeholder. VERIFY: dev server runs, /travel/ithaca renders 3 colored sections, scrolling works, header/footer present, no mobile overflow.

title: Phase 3b: Generate AI vibe images (2-3 images)
description: Generate images per the AI-Generated Vibe Images spec in the design doc. Image 1 (Ch 1 hero): misty gorge at dawn, painterly, NOT photorealistic. Image 2 (optional, Ch 5): deadpan generic hotel exterior at magic hour. Image 3 (optional, Ch 12): abstract water/light/mist texture for low-opacity background. Record in ithaca-credits.json as AI-generated.

title: Phase 3c: Image pipeline + ImageHero component
description: Add sharp as devDependency. Create scripts/process-images.mjs: resize to 600w/1200w/1920w, convert to WebP (q80) + AVIF (q70), extract dominant color placeholders, output manifest JSON. Build ImageHero.astro with <picture>, srcset, gradient overlay, lazy loading, credit line. Add hero support to Chapter.astro. Implement parallax (60% scroll speed). Implement chapter crossfade transitions. Add AI image grain overlay CSS. VERIFY: responsive images served, AVIF/WebP selection works, gradient overlays legible, parallax smooth, AI images show grain, credits visible, lazy loading works, Lighthouse Performance > 90, page weight < 5MB.

title: Phase 3a: Source CC/public domain photography (8-10 images)
description: Source images per the Asset Sourcing Specification in the design doc. Target: Mohawk Trail Hairpin Turn, Bridge of Flowers, Taughannock Falls (hero + before/after pair), waterfall thumbnails, Ganondagan longhouse, Sapsucker Woods, Quechee Gorge or VT bridge. Search Wikimedia Commons, Unsplash, Flickr CC in that priority order. Record attribution in ithaca-credits.json. All images must have CC-BY, CC-BY-SA, or equivalent license.

title: Phase 2: Route Map — SVG path, scroll animation, responsive sidebar
description: Trace SVG route path (Hooksett→Mohawk Trail→Ithaca→Vermont→home), simplify to 200-300 points. Create ithaca-route.svg and ithaca-route.json. Build RouteMap.astro: fixed 60px left sidebar (desktop), 4px top progress bar (mobile). Implement stroke-dashoffset scroll animation via CSS animation-timeline: scroll(). Pin markers with hover/tap labels. Integrate into JourneyLayout. VERIFY: map draws proportionally on scroll, pins appear at correct thresholds, mobile collapses to top bar, @supports fallback shows full map, prefers-reduced-motion shows full map.

title: Add writing/blog section with Astro content collections
close_reason: Implemented in feat/add-writing-blog branch, PR #7. Content collection with glob loader, post layout with prose typography, listing page, dynamic routes, header nav link. Build and type check pass.

title: Phase 5a: Waterfall field guide cards (Ch 7)
description: Build WaterfallCard.astro per component spec. Populate ithaca-waterfalls.json with 10 entries from consensus report tiers. Source thumbnail images, process through pipeline. Horizontal scroll container with scroll-snap. Integrate into Ch 7. VERIFY: cards scroll horizontally with snap, mobile shows scrollbar, all data matches consensus report, thumbnails load correctly.

title: Phase 4: Content & Copy — all 12 chapters
description: Fetch writing style from https://gist.github.com/bitspace/59c0d4a85561aa3c9874c6bb138d5d46 and write all chapter copy per the Chapter-by-Chapter Content Specification in the design doc. Populate ithaca-chapters.json. Build each chapter layout (text positioning, alignment). Implement text fade-in via animation-timeline: view(). Add Fraunces font (self-hosted woff2, preload). Leave Ch 12 as <!-- AUTHOR: Write the closer. --> placeholder. VERIFY: full scroll reads as coherent narrative, typography renders correctly, fade-ins trigger correctly, prefers-reduced-motion shows all text, no overflow on any viewport, contrast > 4.5:1.
